messages.zh: 离上一次见面过去了好久，你过得还好吗？
messages.tl: It’s been a long time since I met last time. Are you still okay?

messages.zh: 在这段时间里......你一直......在徘徊......
messages.tl: During this time...you have been...in the hustle...
... on the edge of the cliff...

messages.zh: 可能，你已经忘了你自己是什么人。
messages.tl: Maybe, you have forgotten who you are.

messages.zh: 不过至少你还记得那个名字，不是吗？
messages.tl: But at least you still remember that name, don't you?
Let's not discuss this issue first...

messages.zh: 你不是我的客人，也并不应该在这里出现。
messages.tl: You are not my guest and should not appear here.

messages.zh: 你知道12月23日对你来说意味着什么吗？
messages.tl: Do you know what it means for you on December 23?

messages.zh: 如果你忘了......我能让你回想起来。
messages.tl: If you forget... I can make you think back.
Start the cycle........................stabilize the main...stop the injection of fluid...
...the state is normal...start the resection...attention to ventricular fibrillation...
... put in st............ ready to rewar...

messages.zh: 呼，呼......阿米娅！你跑太快了！我们小队都没有跟上你啊！
messages.tl: Call, call... Amia! You are running too fast! Our team has not kept up with you!

messages.zh: 那面墙难道是你炸碎的吗......
messages.tl: Is that wall broken by you?

messages.zh: 太冒险了！你可是罗德岛的——
messages.tl: Too risky! You are Rhode Island -
wrong! Don't worry about this, medic!
Come on, take a look at the doctor!

messages.zh: 他好像没有意识的样子......明明刚才还抓住了我......
messages.tl: He doesn't seem to be conscious... obviously caught me just now...

messages.zh: 好......好。你别那么心急。我也很挂念博士的呀。
messages.tl: Ok... well. Don't be so anxious. I am also very worried about the doctor.

messages.zh: 真是的，阿米娅，你要更加小心点才行......
messages.tl: Really, Amia, you have to be more careful...

messages.zh: 嗯......呼吸比较微弱，血压正常，有轻微的心动过缓现象，不要紧——
messages.tl: Um... the breathing is weak, the blood pressure is normal, there is a slight bradycardia, it doesn't matter -

messages.zh: 先别动，你的身体还没有完全适应。
messages.tl: Don't move, your body is not fully adapted.

messages.zh: 阿米娅，我们成功了。他清醒了。
messages.tl: Amia, we have succeeded. He is awake.
You have nothing... don't you remember?
Hey... Where did it come from?
Don't panic, be prepared to fight!

messages.zh: 凯尔希医生的远程通讯呢？
从刚才开始就受到干扰，通讯设备已经停止工作了！
messages.tl: I have been disturbed since the beginning, and the communication equipment has stopped working!

messages.zh: 那样凯尔希医生就不能参与支援了......！
messages.tl: Then Dr. Kelsey can't participate in the support...!
Amia, that can only depend on you...!
Do not. I - still need to fight.
———— I hope to let Dr. PLAYER come to command.

messages.zh: 即使你失去了记忆......但你曾与我们......一同战斗。
messages.tl: Even if you lose your memory... but you have fought with us...

messages.zh: 我们一起度过了许多时光。
messages.tl: We have spent a lot of time together.

messages.zh: ......我知道像这样突然请求你很失礼。
messages.tl: ... I know that suddenly asking you like this is rude.

messages.zh: 不过......拜托了，请你助我们一臂之力。
试着做做吧，我也会辅助你的。
messages.tl: Try to do it, I will help you.
- I believe in you, you can.

messages.zh: 博士，指挥权现在移交给你！
messages.tl: Doctor, the command is now handed over to you!

messages.zh: 也是，博士还不知道我们是谁呢...
messages.tl: Also, the doctor still doesn't know who we are...

messages.zh: Dr.PLAYER，从今以后，你就是我们的一员了。
messages.tl: Dr.PLAYER, from now on, you are one of us.

messages.zh: 请记住大家共同的名字 ——
messages.tl: Please remember the common name of everyone -
